sqlReaderQuery.value:
select watermark_value from dbo.config 
where source_Table like '@{item().source_Table}'

update config
set status='Succeded'
where Dest_Table='@{item().Dest_Table}'

select 1

update config
set status='Succeded'
where Dest_Table='dbo.customer'

select 1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select * from sagar.tbl_source where PurchaseDate>(
select isnull(max(PurchaseDate),'2020-01-01') from sagar.tbl_target)
